name: ColorAtom
body:
### Welcome to ColorAtom.
This is my first iOS game developed by Sprite Kit.  
It's a mini game about atoms...  

![](http://yulingtianxia.qiniudn.com/iPhone_5s_Vert_Slvr_sRGB.png)

[![](http://yulingtianxia.qiniudn.com/Download_on_the_App_Store_Badge_CN_135x40.png)](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/coloratom/id918469696?l=zh&ls=1&mt=8)  

### Support or Contact
